prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Reed, Drums, Piano, Guitar, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1: Reed, Drums, Piano, and Guitar are the instruments featured in this song, but Bass is absent.

Style 2: This song is composed of Reed, Drums, Piano, and Guitar, but Bass is not included.

Style 3: This composition is comprised of Reed, Drums, Piano, and Guitar, omitting Bass.
